Well law and order in india is not improved still yet . Because a son of rich businessman or a rich celebrity son if they are commiting any crime like hit and run case or murder or sexual harassment they are always getting bail because there parents  has lots of lots of money and they have power and they have connection with high profile peoplestoo .and their parents are hering expensive and famous lawyers and charging that lawyer 5 to 17 lakh rupees for each and every hearing . Law doesn't see whether that person is rich or poor that person has coomited crime and he should be punished law and order in india is equal for each andeveryone.
